item.title: 特朗普回归，中国抢购巴西廉价大豆
item.description: 中国买家正在大量采购即将收获的巴西大豆，以利用具有吸引力的价格，在对与美国贸易紧张关系恶化的担忧高涨之际，此举也将有助于保障供应。【原文：Chinese buyers are loading up on Brazilian soybeans from the coming harvest, taking advantage of attractive prices in a move that will also help safeguard supply, at a time when concerns about worsening trade tensions with the US are running high.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁征收更多关税后美元大涨，铜价下滑
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普誓言征收额外关税后，美元走强，铜和其他基本金属周二回落。【原文：Copper and other base metals retreated Tuesday as the dollar strengthened after US President-elect Donald Trump vowed additional tariffs.】

item.title: 日本企业以 1992 年以来最快速度向客户转嫁成本
item.description: 日本央行的数据显示，日本企业正以 32 年来最快的速度将不断上涨的劳动力成本以提高服务价格的形式转嫁给商业客户，这为提高基准利率提供了支持。【原文：Japanese companies are passing on rising labor costs to business customers in the form of higher service prices at the fastest pace in 32 years, according to Bank of Japan data that support the case for raising the benchmark interest rate.】

item.title: StanChart 是印度枢纽美元结算银行的领跑者
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，渣打银行已成为印度最新金融中心实时美元交易结算银行的领跑者。【原文：Standard Chartered Plc has emerged as the front-runner to become the settlement bank for real-time dollar-denominated trades in India’s newest financial hub, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本储蓄银行效仿野村证券披露阿达尼基金风险敞口
item.description: 随着印度企业集团阿达尼集团丑闻的余波扩散，SBI 控股公司与野村控股公司和其他日本金融公司一起公布了其共同基金持有阿达尼集团公司证券的详细情况。【原文：SBI Holdings Inc. has joined Nomura Holdings Inc. and other Japanese financial firms in releasing details of their mutual funds’ exposure to securities in the Adani Group companies, as fallout spreads from the Indian conglomerate’s scandal.】

item.title: 比特币从 100,000 美元回撤，遭遇特朗普获胜以来最糟糕局面
item.description: 自唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得美国大选以来，比特币创下了最长的连跌记录，在此之前，比特币曾一度跌至 100,000 美元，而当选总统对加密货币的热情也有所降温。【原文：Bitcoin posted its longest losing streak for the period since Donald Trump’s US election victory, following a failed run at $100,000 and amid cooling fervor over the president-elect’s embrace of crypto.】

item.title: Stonepeak 支持的 Digital Edge 计划为印度数据中心提供贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由私募股权基金 Stonepeak Infrastructure Partners 支持的 Digital Edge DC 公司正在向银行寻求潜在贷款，以便为印度的一个数据中心项目提供资金。【原文：Digital Edge DC, a company backed by private equity fund Stonepeak Infrastructure Partners, is reaching out to banks for a potential loan to fund a data center project in India, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉马杜罗就致命挑战传唤 TikTok 官员
item.description: 尼古拉斯-马杜罗总统说，委内瑞拉最高法院就本月造成三名儿童死亡的病毒挑战传唤了 TikTok 官员。【原文：President Nicolás Maduro said the country’s highest court summoned TikTok officials to Venezuela over viral challenges that have killed three children this month.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁对加拿大和墨西哥征收关税，美元受助，黄金下跌
item.description: 当选总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁对加拿大和墨西哥征收 25% 的进口关税后，美元跳涨，黄金下跌。【原文：Gold fell as the dollar jumped after President-elect Donald Trump threatened import tariffs of 25% on Canada and Mexico.】

item.title: 阿达尼股票在美国调查回调前吸引散户投资者
item.description: 在美国当局对阿达尼集团创始人提出令人震惊的贿赂指控之前，印度散户投资者增持了阿达尼集团的股票，而机构投资者则大多减持了股票。【原文：India’s retail investors increased their holdings in the Adani Group prior to the shock bribery charges by US authorities against its founder, even as institutions largely pared their stakes.】

item.title: 汇丰银行认为高盛和摩根士丹利的风险回报 "缺乏吸引力
item.description: 汇丰银行（HSBC）分析师表示，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and Morgan Stanley shares are showing an “unattractive risk reward profile” in the wake of the recent bank rally, HSBC analysts said, adding that investors should be wary of arguments that an investment banking “supercycle” will drives shares much higher.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁加征关税，美元反弹，墨西哥比索下滑
item.description: 在当选总统唐纳德-特朗普表示美国将对主要贸易伙伴征收更多关税后，美元上涨，抹去了周一的大部分跌幅。【原文：The dollar gained, erasing a chunk of Monday’s decline, after President-elect Donald Trump said the US will more impose tariffs on key trading partners.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行将于 2026 年把新加坡增设为私人银行预订中心
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）计划将新加坡作为其在亚太地区私人银行业务的第二个预订中心，标志着巴克莱银行全面回归财富中心。【原文：Barclays Plc plans to add Singapore as its second booking center for its private bank operations in Asia Pacific, marking a full return to the wealth hub.】

item.title: 以色列停火取得进展，石油价格跌后趋稳
item.description: 由于以色列称已接近与真主党达成停火协议，石油价格在前一交易日大幅下跌后趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied after a sharp drop in the previous session as Israel said that it had edged closer to a cease-fire agreement with Hezbollah.】

item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Medline Industries Inc.【原文：Medline Industries Inc.’s owners have picked banks for its US initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德国默克尔表示支持改革债务制动政策
item.description: 德国前总理安格拉-默克尔（Angela Merkel）和巴伐利亚州总理马库斯-苏德（Markus Soeder）表示，他们对改革德国严格的借贷限制持开放态度，这表明保守派基督教民主党（Christian Democrats）偏离了传统立场。【原文：Former German Chancellor Angela Merkel and Bavaria’s prime minister, Markus Soeder, said they’re open to reforming the country’s strict borrowing limits, signaling a departure from the traditional stance of the conservative Christian Democrats, who are leading in polls ahead of an election in February.】

item.title: 美联储卡什卡利称考虑下月降息是合理的
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）表示，在央行 12 月份的会议上考虑再次降息仍然是合适的。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari said it is still appropriate to consider another interest-rate cut at the central bank’s December meeting.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将上涨，债券受贝森特影响反弹：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市有望延续周一的涨势，因为唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）挑选斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）担任财政部长的消息提振了美国债券和股票，交易员们押注这位对冲基金经理将为这一职位带来华尔街思维。【原文：Stocks in Asia are poised to extend Monday’s gains as Donald Trump’s pick of Scott Bessent for Treasury Secretary lifted US bonds and shares, with traders betting the hedge-fund manager will bring a Wall Street mindset to the role.】

item.title: 电信公司 Digicel 告诉债权人它正面临美国司法部的调查
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Digicel 集团在一次私人财报电话会议上告诉债权人，它正在配合美国司法部的调查。【原文：Digicel Group told creditors it is cooperating with a US Justice Department probe in a private earnings call, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 新西兰称新西兰央行规则调整将促进社区住房建设
item.description: 新西兰住房部长克里斯-毕晓普（Chris Bishop）表示，新西兰政府希望储备银行考虑其规定可能会如何阻碍社区住房提供商以最佳利率获得融资。【原文：New Zealand’s government wants the Reserve Bank to consider how its rules may be preventing community housing providers from accessing finance at the best rates, Housing Minister Chris Bishop said.】

item.title: Ken Leech 因涉嫌 "偷梁换柱 "计划被美国证券交易委员会起诉
item.description: 前 Western Asset Management Co. 联席首席投资官 Ken Leech 因涉嫌参与 "挑肥拣瘦 "计划，将表现较好的交易不成比例地分配给偏爱的投资组合，而将表现较差的交易分配给其他投资组合而被美国监管机构起诉。【原文：Former Western Asset Management Co. co-Chief Investment Officer Ken Leech was sued by US regulators for engaging in an alleged “cherry-picking” scheme to disproportionately allocate better performing trades to favored portfolios and worse-performing trades to others.】

item.title: 中联重科发布内线销售预测，投资者寻求更多信息
item.description: Zoom Video Communications Inc. 公布的本季度销售预测未能给投资者留下深刻印象。【原文：Zoom Video Communications Inc. gave a sales forecast for the current quarter that failed to impress investors who were expecting a bigger boost from the company’s expanded suite of products.】

item.title: 金-多特科姆（Kim Dotcom）面临被引渡到美国，他说自己中风了
item.description: 面临从新西兰引渡到美国的互联网企业家金-多特科姆（Kim Dotcom）说，他正在从 "严重中风 "中恢复。【原文：Kim Dotcom, the internet entrepreneur facing extradition from New Zealand to the US, said he is recovering from a “serious stroke.”】

item.title: 谷歌在广告技术案中的论证招致法官质疑
item.description: 在美国司法部指控谷歌垄断广告技术的诉讼中，一名联邦法官对 Alphabet 公司的一个关键论点泼了一盆冷水。【原文：A federal judge threw cold water on one of Alphabet Inc.’s key arguments in a Department of Justice lawsuit over allegations that Google monopolized advertising technology.】

item.title: 贝森特入选特朗普内阁后，国债收益率也随之上涨
item.description: 斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）被提名为美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的财政部长候选人后，美国国债市场随之上涨，交易员们押注这位对冲基金经理将为财政部长一职带来华尔街思维。【原文：Municipal bonds jumped on Monday, following gains in the US Treasury market after Scott Bessent was named as President-elect Donald Trump’s nominee for Treasury secretary, with traders betting the hedge fund manager will bring a Wall Street mindset to the role.】

item.title: 美国指控阿达尼行贿，阿达尼的全球野心受挫
item.description: 在美国联邦检察官上周起诉高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）涉嫌贿赂数小时后，肯尼亚取消了这位富豪的企业集团争取到的价值 26 亿美元的机场和输电合同。【原文：Hours after US federal prosecutors indicted Gautam Adani over a bribery plot last week, Kenya canceled $2.6 billion worth of airport and power transmission contracts the tycoon’s conglomerate had pitched for.】

item.title: 韩国人对经济前景的担忧达到 2022 年以来的最快速度
item.description: 根据央行在唐纳德-特朗普赢得美国大选后进行的月度调查，韩国人对经济前景的担忧在 11 月份以两年多来最快的速度恶化。【原文：South Koreans’ outlook for the economy deteriorated at the fastest pace in more than two years in November, according to a monthly central bank survey conducted after Donald Trump’s US election victory.】
